tool_description: AIDS is an Amazon India Data Scrapper that can help in getting details, reviews and offers of the product by id, and also user can search by any query.
title: AIDS

api_list.name: GET PRODUCTS BY ID

body.name: All Natural Peanut Butter 1 KG Value Pack (Crunchy)
body.full_description: PintoLA All Natural Peanut Butter is made under an ISO 22000, BRC, HACCP certified and FSSAI approved production unit. We merge high-quality, fresh, delicious and crunchy nuts which are manually sorted to deliver amazing taste, texture and nutrition. Stuffed with PROTEIN, our All Natural products are GLUTEN-FREE, NON-GMO, DAIRY FREE and contain 0g trans fat. This product is a boon for Gym-goers, Athletes, Runners, Dieters and Health conscious folks. It is an excellent source of Protein, Fibres, Nutrients and Good Fats. Having a jar of PintoLA All Natural peanut butter is synonymous to having a feel of utter satisfaction. ¬ÃÂ ¬ÃÂ ¬ÃÂ IMPORTANT NOTE: If you happen to come across a layer of oil on top of jar, don¬ÃÂt panic. It is just natural oil from peanuts. Because we made this product so pure that even Hydrogenated Oils (stabilizers) are not present. So, now if you think again, Oil you see is actually a proof of Product being Natural and Pure. ¬ÃÂ ¬ÃÂ ¬ÃÂ

api_list.name: GET PRODUCT REVIEWS
api_list.description: Get Amazon India product reviews by Id

product.name: Pintola All Natural Peanut Butter (Crunchy) (1kg) | Unsweetened | 30g Protein | Non GMO | Gluten Free | Vegan | Cholesterol Free

top_positive_review.title: Must read before buying
top_positive_review.review: Expensive when compared to other brands, but considering it is all natural and the nutritive value I think its worth the buy.Not for those who are looking for an alternative of jam, nutella or any other spreads as it lacks sugar/artificial sweeteners/flavorings. You'll get to taste only peanuts. People looking to buy it as a source of healthy fats should definitely try it.Regarding delivery and packaging: For me the product arrived early, there was no sign of damage or tampering at all. It was nicely packed, the seal wasn't broken either, no leakage.Consistency: As it is all natural it lacks emulsifiers, stabilizers & preservatives hence it was slight liquidy when it arrived but once you store it in refrigerator it becomes thick and you can scoop it out from a spoon. I always store it in my refrigerator.PS: I bought Pintola All Natural Crunchy Peanut Butter, 1kg (Unsweetened) sold by Das Foodtech Pvt Ltd for INR 429.

top_critical_review.title: Defected Product
top_critical_review.review: When I opened the box which contained the peanut butter, the lid of the jar was broker as well the seal was broken. Since this product has no return policy, I have lost my money. I recommend not to buy this.

reviews.title: Must read before buying
reviews.review: Expensive when compared to other brands, but considering it is all natural and the nutritive value I think its worth the buy.Not for those who are looking for an alternative of jam, nutella or any other spreads as it lacks sugar/artificial sweeteners/flavorings. You'll get to taste only peanuts. People looking to buy it as a source of healthy fats should definitely try it.Regarding delivery and packaging: For me the product arrived early, there was no sign of damage or tampering at all. It was nicely packed, the seal wasn't broken either, no leakage.Consistency: As it is all natural it lacks emulsifiers, stabilizers & preservatives hence it was slight liquidy when it arrived but once you store it in refrigerator it becomes thick and you can scoop it out from a spoon. I always store it in my refrigerator.PS: I bought Pintola All Natural Crunchy Peanut Butter, 1kg (Unsweetened) sold by Das Foodtech Pvt Ltd for INR 429.

reviews.title: healthy peanut butter which doesn’t feel heavy
reviews.review: I have tried many peanut butter. This is the first time trying out “all natural” type and it feels very good on stomach after consumption. Usually other peanut butters with sugars, salts and hydrogenated oils feels heavy after consumption. This one doesn’t have any taste but it’s really good for dieters and high intensity trainers

reviews.title: Please maintain this quality at this affordable price point
reviews.review: Really liked this local produce; good job by Pintola/Das Foodtech to offer this quality peanut butter in India. Thanks to Amazon, your name is now spreading far n wide! Hope you will stick to this quality at this affordable price point and allow more Indians to savour this health food found in every American home.Received a perfectly sealed 1kg plastic jar, with current mth mnfg dt.

reviews.title: PintoLA Crunchy peanut butter review
reviews.review: I had had my first encounter with peanut butter through Sundrop's product. To be honest, I hated its sweet and sugary taste and thought that peanut butter and I are not made for each other.But then I found this product of PintoLA and decided to give my relationship with PB another chance. And guess what, I absolutely loved it! It's free from any additive, have good fats and is a source of healthy protein; so I eat one spoonful whenever I have urges and it keeps me satiated for a long time.TL;DR: Go for it, if you like the natural taste of peanuts.

reviews.title: Defected Product
reviews.review: When I opened the box which contained the peanut butter, the lid of the jar was broker as well the seal was broken. Since this product has no return policy, I have lost my money. I recommend not to buy this.

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.review: Go defective product. The lid of the tin is totally broken. Manufacturing date is not mentioned any where. Very worst

reviews.title: Not fit for consumption. Unfit product delivered by amazon
reviews.review: This peanut butter doesn't have the consistently of the peanut butter. Its runny and liquid like. The taste as expected is not sweet which is a good thing. But you can't even spread it on bread because it's not at all viscous and sticky as a peanut butter should be. Also I guess may be the product I am given is not fit for consumption. And Amazon doesn't have a return policy for this.. so this gives me one more reason of why not to buy groceries from Amazon... In you face Amazon 😒

reviews.title: Yummyness-High!
reviews.review: seriously it is very tasty and healthy too as it contains Fibre and easy digestive fat that is required by our body to perform our day to day activitiesit is 0 in trans fat or cholostrol.This is a pure peanut butter no other things are mixed in it. If you love peenut butter then, trust me it is made for u. it is very creamy and smooth.wonderful product to start ur morning. I really love this product and gonna be purchase again and again.packed with real peanut pieces, making it a dream come true for PB-lovers who prefer the extra crunch.If you are trying the peanut butter for the first time i would suggest you to try PINTOLA PEANUT BUTTER.

reviews.title: INSECTS IN MY JAR
reviews.review: I have already eaten more than half for a jar and now I noticed some black substance at the end part of the pack. After looking closely it was some insects remains. HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED. Amazon should black this brand and this seller. It is so disgusting even after paying the full amount you get to know that it is infected is the worse.PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS.I am writing a mail to the amazon.

reviews.title: Loving it. Healthy, tasty and value for money.
reviews.review: Delivered after 3 days of ordering. The Flavor is just classic roasted peanuts, and I love it. No added sugar or preservatives.I mix two tablespoons in my Protein shake and now it tastes out of this world. If you are trying to build muscle or on Keto diet, or just love taste of peanuts then go for it. The crunchy taste comes from some uncrushed peanut particles which I love to chew. Thanks Fit Tuber for recommending this product.
